title: Business analyst
description:
We are looking for a skilled and detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our team. The ideal candidate will act as a bridge between business stakeholders and technical teams, analysing business needs, defining requirements, and ensuring that solutions meet business objectives. The role requires strong analytical skills, excellent communication, and a deep understanding of business processes and technology.

Key Responsibilities

Requirement Gathering and Analysis


Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document business requirements.
Translate business needs into detailed functional and technical specifications.
Identify gaps and areas of improvement in existing processes.


Solution Development


Work closely with developers, designers, and project teams to ensure solutions align with requirements.
Support the development and implementation of business solutions.


Stakeholder Communication


Act as a liaison between business units, technology teams, and support teams.
Facilitate workshops, meetings, and presentations with stakeholders.


Testing and Quality Assurance


Develop and execute test plans to ensure solutions meet business requirements.
Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and document results.


Data Analysis and Reporting


Analyse data to identify trends, insights, and areas for improvement.
Develop reports, dashboards, and visualizations to support decision-making.


Project Management Support


Assist in project planning, tracking, and documentation.
Ensure deliverables are completed on time and meet quality standards.


Key Qualifications


Educational Background: Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.
Experience: 2–5 years of experience as a Business Analyst or in a similar role.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in business analysis tools (e.g., JIRA, Confluence).
Strong understanding of SQL and data analysis tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Familiarity with software development methodologies (Agile, Scrum).
Soft Skills:
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities.
Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks effectively.


Preferred Skills


Certifications such as CBAP (Certified Business Analysis Professional) or PMI-PBA.
Experience with process modeling tools (e.g., BPMN, Visio).
Knowledge of specific industries or business domains (e.g., finance, healthcare, retail).
